text.section:
A secured party's disposition of collateral after default:
Transfers to a transferee for value all of the debtor's rights in the collateral;
Discharges the security interest under which the disposition is made; and
Discharges any subordinate security interest or other subordinate lien.

A transferee that acts in good faith takes free of the rights and interests described in subsection (a), even if the secured party fails to comply with this title or the requirements of any judicial proceeding.

If a transferee does not take free of the rights and interests described in subsection (a), the transferee takes the collateral subject to:
The debtor's rights in the collateral;
The security interest or agricultural lien under which the disposition is made; and
Any other security interest or other lien.
